title: Account Deletion
body: I can't login in support to submit a ticket to delete this account since my account isnt verified and ill never be able to verify my account cuz i deleted my email lol. What am i supposed to do now? It really bothers me to just leave this account unactive.

replies.body: Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) when you can! Be sure to pick the option "I need help recovering my account" and once you're verified as the creator of the account I'm sure we can help you out in getting back on that account.
